titleInfo.title: ‘PLAN OF THE SEAWARD DEFENCES AT STEAMER POINT, ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:704 x 1403 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Unsigned and undated.Relief shown by shading.Plan depicts the coastal defences at the Steamer Point (modern Tawahi), with Ras Morbat fort, Haines’ Battery, and proposed buildings and roads on Ras Tarshayne. Features shown include location of Arab Lines and Lascars, naval stores, Police and Post Offices, and coal grounds occupied by different Companies.
